description: Golden signal metrics (RED) collected via OpenTelemetry eBPF Instrumentation (OBI) in kvisor DaemonSet. Covers HTTP, gRPC, SQL, Redis, Kafka, and K8s cluster state (pod health, restarts, workload availability).

targets.expr: sum by(k8s_namespace_name, service_name) (rate({__name__=~"http_server_request_duration_seconds_sum|http_server_request_duration_sum",k8s_namespace_name=~"$namespace",service_name=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(k8s_namespace_name, service_name) (rate({__name__=~"http_server_request_duration_seconds_count|http_server_request_duration_count",k8s_namespace_name=~"$namespace",service_name=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(k8s_namespace_name, service_name) (rate({__name__=~"http_client_request_duration_seconds_sum|http_client_request_duration_sum",k8s_namespace_name=~"$namespace",service_name=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(k8s_namespace_name, service_name) (rate({__name__=~"http_client_request_duration_seconds_count|http_client_request_duration_count",k8s_namespace_name=~"$namespace",service_name=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(k8s_namespace_name, service_name) (rate({__name__=~"rpc_server_duration_seconds_sum|rpc_server_duration_sum",k8s_namespace_name=~"$namespace",service_name=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(k8s_namespace_name, service_name) (rate({__name__=~"rpc_server_duration_seconds_count|rpc_server_duration_count",k8s_namespace_name=~"$namespace",service_name=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(k8s_namespace_name, service_name) (rate({__name__=~"rpc_client_duration_seconds_sum|rpc_client_duration_sum",k8s_namespace_name=~"$namespace",service_name=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(k8s_namespace_name, service_name) (rate({__name__=~"rpc_client_duration_seconds_count|rpc_client_duration_count",k8s_namespace_name=~"$namespace",service_name=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]))

topk(10, histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(k8s_namespace_name, service_name, le) (rate({__name__=~"http_server_request_duration_seconds_bucket|http_server_request_duration_bucket",k8s_namespace_name=~"$namespace",service_name=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]))))

title: CAST AI â€” Reliability Metrics (OBI)
